entry.name: AccuracyDescription
entry.value: Each point of accuracy increases the hit chance by approximately 8.3%.

entry.name: ActionsDescription
entry.value: The amount of actions the unit can perform. Using an action may consume all movement.

entry.name: AdditionalMembersHit
entry.value: Group Members Hit At Half Accuracy

entry.name: AlgaeDescription
entry.value: Used to produce and maintain Voice units.

entry.name: AlgaeCostDescription
entry.value: The amount of algae it costs for the entity to be produced.

entry.name: AlgaeUpkeepDescription
entry.value: The amount of algae it costs each turn for the entity to be maintained.

entry.name: AntimatterDescription
entry.value: Used to produce and maintain advanced special units.

entry.name: AntimatterCostDescription
entry.value: The amount of antimatter it costs for the entity to be produced.

entry.name: AntimatterUpkeepDescription
entry.value: The amount of antimatter it costs each turn for the entity to be maintained.

entry.name: ArmorDescription
entry.value: Reduces the amount of <icon height='20' texture='Icons/Attributes/Damage'/> damage taken from weapons and abilities. <string name='Attributes/ArmorDescription/Reduction'/>

entry.name: ArmorDescription/Reduction
entry.value: Each point of armor reduces the damage taken by approximately 8.3% (up to 83%), but weapons and abilities ignore a number of armor points up to their armor penetration value.

entry.name: ArmorPenetrationDescription
entry.value: The amount of a target's armor the weapon ignores when a unit is attacking with it.

entry.name: AttacksDescription
entry.value: The number of attacks a weapon makes against its target when a unit attacks with it.

entry.name: AttacksPerAdditionalEnemyGroupMember
entry.value: Attacks Per Additional Target Group Member

entry.name: CanEnemyOverwatch
entry.value: overwatch attacks from targeting this unit

entry.name: CanHealPassivelyWithoutFullMovementPoints
entry.value: heal passively without full movement points

entry.name: CargoSlotsDescription
entry.value: The number of non-large units this unit can transport in its cargo hold.

entry.name: ChipsDescription
entry.value: Used to produce and maintain Cyber units.

entry.name: ChipsCostDescription
entry.value: The amount of chips it costs for the entity to be produced.

entry.name: ChipsUpkeepDescription
entry.value: The amount of chips it costs each turn for the entity to be maintained.

entry.name: DamageDescription
entry.value: The damage dealt against an enemy unit with each attack of the weapon. <string name='Attributes/DamageDescription/Reductions'/>

entry.name: DamageDescription/Reductions
entry.value: Damage dealt is capped by the maximum hitpoints of a single group member of the enemy unit and further reduced by accuracy, the enemy's armor as well as their damage reductions.

entry.name: DimensionalEchoesDescription
entry.value: Used to produce and maintain advanced Voice units.

entry.name: DimensionalEchoesCostDescription
entry.value: The amount of dimensional echoes it costs for the entity to be produced.

entry.name: DimensionalEchoesUpkeepDescription
entry.value: The amount of dimensional echoes it costs each turn for the entity to be maintained.

entry.name: EnergyDescription
entry.value: Used to maintain buildings as well as produce and maintain special units.

entry.name: EnergyCostDescription
entry.value: The amount of energy it costs for the entity to be produced.

entry.name: EnergyUpkeepDescription
entry.value: The amount of energy it costs each turn for the entity to be maintained.

entry.name: FoodDescription
entry.value: Used to sustain the population in cities as well as produce and maintain primarily Human and Voice units.

entry.name: FoodCostDescription
entry.value: The amount of food it costs for the entity to be produced.

entry.name: FoodUpkeepDescription
entry.value: The amount of food it costs each turn for the entity to be maintained.

entry.name: GroupSizeDescription
entry.value: The number of alive as well as total group members of a unit. <string name='Attributes/GroupSizeDescription/Change'/>

entry.name: GroupSizeDescription/Change
entry.value: Group members are lost and regained with the unit losing and regaining hitpoints. Group members that have died off do not deal any damage, thus reducing the total damage output of the unit.

entry.name: GrowthDescription/Decrease
entry.value: Population growth rate decreases if there is a shortage of food or housing.

entry.name: GrowthDescription/Increase
entry.value: Once enough growth has been accumulated, population increases by one. <string name='Attributes/GrowthDescription/Decrease'/>

entry.name: HitpointsDescription
entry.value: The amount of <icon height='20' texture='Icons/Attributes/Damage'/> damage the unit can sustain before dying. <string name='Attributes/HitpointsDescription/Healing'/>

entry.name: HitpointsDescription/Healing
entry.value: Units automatically heal if they have not taken damage and have full movement and action points remaining.

entry.name: InfluenceDescription
entry.value: Used to acquire and maintain city tiles, invoke special abilities, recruit and maintain hero units as well as purchase items and resources.

entry.name: InfluenceCostDescription
entry.value: The amount of influence it costs for the entity to be produced.

entry.name: InfluencePerAlliance
entry.value: Influence Per Alliance For Both Parties

entry.name: InfluencePerTradeAgreement
entry.value: Influence Per Trade Agreement For Both Parties

entry.name: InfluenceUpkeepDescription
entry.value: The amount of influence it costs each turn for the entity to be maintained.

entry.name: ItemSlotsDescription
entry.value: The number of items this unit can be equipped with.

entry.name: LevelDescription
entry.value: The experience level of the unit.

entry.name: LevelDescription/Effect
entry.value: Every level above the first increases the unit's <icon height='20' texture='Icons/Attributes/Hitpoints'/> hitpoints and <icon height='20' texture='Icons/Attributes/Damage'/> damage by 5% as well as <icon height='20' texture='Icons/Attributes/Morale'/> morale by 10%.

entry.name: LevelDescription/Death
entry.value: When a unit dies, the attacker and their allies gain experience in a 3 tile radius of the dying unit; the attacker always gains experience, regardless of distance.

entry.name: LevelDescription/DeathNoAttacker
entry.value: If there is no attacker when a unit dies, all enemies of the dying unit gain experience in a 3 tile radius.

entry.name: LoyaltyDescription
entry.value: The population's dedication to your cause. <string name='Attributes/LoyaltyDescription/Effect'/> <string name='Attributes/LoyaltyDescription/CityPenalty'/>

entry.name: LoyaltyDescription/Effect
entry.value: Each positive point of loyalty increases the city's total resource output by 1% while each negative point decreases it by 2% (down to -50%).

entry.name: LoyaltyDescription/CityPenalty
entry.value: Each city after the first decreases the loyalty in all cities by 6.

entry.name: LoyaltyUpkeepDescription
entry.value: The amount of loyalty it costs each turn for the entity to be maintained.

entry.name: MoraleDescription
entry.value: The psychological state of the unit.

entry.name: MoraleDescription/Regeneration
entry.value: Morale regenerates if the unit has not taken damage the previous turn.

entry.name: MoraleDescription/Shaken
entry.value: Below 66% morale, units become <icon height='20' texture='Icons/Traits/Shaken'/> shaken, decreasing attacks and increasing enemy attacks by 17%.

entry.name: MoraleDescription/Broken
entry.value: Below 33% morale, units become <icon height='20' texture='Icons/Traits/Broken'/> broken, decreasing attacks and increasing enemy attacks by 33%.

entry.name: MoraleDescription/Death
entry.value: When a unit dies, the unit's allies in a 3 tile radius of the dying unit and the attacker lose morale based on the experience value of the dying unit. At the same time, the attacker's allies gain morale in the same area.

entry.name: MovementDescription
entry.value: The number of tiles a unit can move through in one turn. Rough terrain requires more than a single movement point. Moving into a tile adjacent to an enemy ends movement.

entry.name: MineralsDescription
entry.value: Used to construct buildings as well as produce and maintain primarily Human and Cyber units.

entry.name: MineralsCostDescription
entry.value: The amount of minerals it costs for the entity to be produced.

entry.name: MineralsUpkeepDescription
entry.value: The amount of minerals it costs each turn for the entity to be maintained.

entry.name: PopulationDescription
entry.value: Used to operate buildings in the city. Each enabled building requires one population to operate. If the required population exceeds the current population, the output of buildings is reduced.

entry.name: PopulationCostDescription
entry.value: The amount of population consumed by the action.

entry.name: PopulationLimitDescription
entry.value: The living space available for population.

entry.name: ProductionDescription
entry.value: How fast the building produces. Completing a task preserves any excess production.

entry.name: ProductionCostDescription
entry.value: The amount of production it costs for the entity to be produced.

entry.name: RangeDescription
entry.value: The maximum distance in tiles away from the unit at which a target can be attacked by a weapon or affected by an ability. Unless specified otherwise, usage of a unit weapon or ability also requires line of sight to the target.

entry.name: ResearchDescription
entry.value: Used to discover new technologies. Completing a discovery preserves any excess research.

entry.name: ResearchCostDescription
entry.value: The amount of research that is consumed.

entry.name: ResearchUpkeepDescription
entry.value: The amount of research it costs each turn for the entity to be maintained.

entry.name: SightDescription
entry.value:
How far the unit can see.

Line of sight is reduced by terrain features such as forests, smoke and cliffs.

entry.name: SingularityCoresDescription
entry.value: Used to produce and maintain advanced Cyber units.

entry.name: SingularityCoresCostDescription
entry.value: The amount of singularity cores it costs for the entity to be produced.

entry.name: SingularityCoresUpkeepDescription
entry.value: The amount of singularity cores it costs each turn for the entity to be maintained.

entry.name: TransuraniumDescription
entry.value: Used to produce and maintain advanced Human and Cyber units.

entry.name: TransuraniumCostDescription
entry.value: The amount of transuranium it costs for the entity to be produced.

entry.name: TransuraniumUpkeepDescription
entry.value: The amount of transuranium it costs each turn for the entity to be maintained.

entry.name: TurnsDescription
entry.value: The number of turns it takes for the entity to be produced.
